name: xcode
title: Xcode
author: Sven Tiigi
description: Open your recent Xcode Projects, view the latest Xcode Releases and manage your Xcode Simulators

commands.name: projects-command
commands.title: Projects
commands.subtitle: Your recent Xcode Projects
commands.description: Search and open your recent Xcode Projects

commands.name: releases-command
commands.title: Releases
commands.subtitle: The latest Xcode Releases
commands.description: Search, download and view the latest Xcode Releases

commands.name: simulator-applications-command
commands.title: Apps
commands.subtitle: Apps installed on Xcode Simulators
commands.description: View the bundle and sandbox path of your Apps that are installed on a Xcode Simulator

commands.name: create-swift-package-command
commands.title: Create Swift Package
commands.subtitle: Create a new Swift Package
commands.description: Create a new Swift Package and open it directly in Xcode
